languages.text: {n}Когда силы Кассии отступают, строгость на ее лице впервые сменяется чувственной страстностью — в ее глазах, изгибе губ, легком наклоне головы. Девушка, кротко кивая, с улыбкой на порозовевших губах, протягивает вам ладонь, бледную и трепещущую.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Когда силы Кассии отступают, строгость на ее лице впервые сменяется чувственной страстностью — в ее глазах, изгибе губ, легком наклоне головы. Девушка, кротко кивая, с улыбкой на порозовевших губах, протягивает вам ладонь, бледную и трепещущую.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}When Cassia's powers recede, the austere reserve on her face is replaced for the first time by passion — in her eyes, the curve of her lips, the slight tilt of her head. With a small nod and a smile on reddened lips, she holds out her hand, pale and trembling.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когда силы Кассии отступают, строгость на ее лице впервые сменяется чувственной страстностью — в ее глазах, изгибе губ, легком наклоне головы. Девушка, кротко кивая, с улыбкой на порозовевших губах, протягивает вам ладонь, бледную и трепещущую.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}When Cassia's powers recede, the austere reserve on her face is replaced for the first time by sensual passion — in her eyes, the curve of her lips, the slight tilt of her head. With a small nod and a smile on reddened lips, she holds out her hand, pale and trembling.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}When Cassia's powers recede, the austere reserve on her face is replaced for the first time by sensual passion — in her eyes, the curve of her lips, the slight tilt of her head. With a small nod and a smile on reddened lips, she holds out her hand, pale and trembling.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}When Cassia's powers recede, the austere reserve on her face is replaced for the first time by sensual passion — in her eyes, the curve of her lips, the slight tilt of her head. With a small nod and a smile on reddened lips, she holds out her hand, pale and trembling.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}When Cassia's powers recede, the austere reserve on her face is replaced for the first time by passion — in her eyes, the curve of her lips, the slight tilt of her head. With a small nod and a smile on reddened lips, she holds out her hand, pale and trembling.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cuando los poderes de Cassia se disipan, la austera circunspección de su rostro se ve reemplazada por la pasión: en sus ojos, en el contorno de sus labios, en su cabeza ligeramente ladeada. Asiente con una sonrisa ruborizada y extiende una mano pálida y temblorosa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When Cassia's powers recede, the austere reserve on her face is replaced for the first time by passion — in her eyes, the curve of her lips, the slight tilt of her head. With a small nod and a smile on reddened lips, she holds out her hand, pale and trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando los poderes de Cassia se disipan, la austera circunspección de su rostro se ve reemplazada por una pasión sensual: en sus ojos, en el contorno de sus labios, en su cabeza ligeramente ladeada. Asiente con una sonrisa ruborizada y extiende una mano pálida y temblorosa.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}力がおさまると、カシアは初めて官能的な情熱の表情を浮かべた。彼女の目、唇の上がり具合、わずかに首をかしげる仕草が示している。彼女は小さくうなずき、赤みを帯びた唇で笑みを見せ、震えている青白い手を差し出した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When Cassia's powers recede, the austere reserve on her face is replaced for the first time by passion — in her eyes, the curve of her lips, the slight tilt of her head. With a small nod and a smile on reddened lips, she holds out her hand, pale and trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}力がおさまると、カシアは初めて官能的な情熱の表情を浮かべた。彼女の目、唇の上がり具合、わずかに首をかしげる仕草が示している。彼女は小さくうなずき、赤みを帯びた唇で笑みを見せ、震えている青白い手を差し出した。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}当卡西娅的力量退去时，她脸上端庄的矜持第一次变成了炽热的激情。她的双眼、她嘴唇的曲线、她微微倾斜的头部，无不体现着这点。卡西娅轻轻点了点头，红润的嘴唇上露出微笑，向你伸出了苍白、颤抖的手。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When Cassia's powers recede, the austere reserve on her face is replaced for the first time by passion — in her eyes, the curve of her lips, the slight tilt of her head. With a small nod and a smile on reddened lips, she holds out her hand, pale and trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当卡西娅的力量退去时，她脸上端庄的矜持第一次变成了充满感性的激情。她的双眼、她嘴唇的曲线、她微微倾斜的头部，无不体现着这点。卡西娅轻轻点了点头，红润的嘴唇上露出微笑，向你伸出了苍白、颤抖的手。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les pouvoirs de Cassia se dissipent tandis que la réserve austère de son visage est remplacée pour la première fois par une passion qui s'exprime dans ses yeux, la courbe de ses lèvres et la légère inclinaison de sa tête. Avec un petit hochement de tête et un sourire flamboyant, elle vous tend une main pâle et tremblante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When Cassia's powers recede, the austere reserve on her face is replaced for the first time by passion — in her eyes, the curve of her lips, the slight tilt of her head. With a small nod and a smile on reddened lips, she holds out her hand, pale and trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les pouvoirs de Cassia se dissipent tandis que la réserve austère de son visage est remplacée pour la première fois par une passion sensuelle qui s'exprime dans ses yeux, la courbe de ses lèvres et la légère inclinaison de sa tête. Avec un petit hochement de tête et un sourire flamboyant, elle vous tend une main pâle et tremblante.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Als Cassias Kräfte nachlassen, weicht die strenge Reserviertheit auf ihrem Gesicht erstmals der Leidenschaft – in ihren Augen, ihren Lippen, der leichten Neigung ihres Kopfs. Mit einem kleinen Nicken und einem Lächeln auf geröteten Lippen streckt sie ihre Hand aus, blass und zitternd.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When Cassia's powers recede, the austere reserve on her face is replaced for the first time by passion — in her eyes, the curve of her lips, the slight tilt of her head. With a small nod and a smile on reddened lips, she holds out her hand, pale and trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als Cassias Kräfte nachlassen, weicht die strenge Reserviertheit auf ihrem Gesicht erstmals sinnlicher Leidenschaft — in ihren Augen, ihren Lippen, der leichten Neigung ihres Kopfs. Mit einem kleinen Nicken und einem Lächeln auf geröteten Lippen streckt sie ihre Hand aus, blass und zitternd.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia'nın yüzündeki ağırbaşlı ve kayıtsız ifade, güçleri geri çekildiğinde yerini ilk kez tutkuya bırakıyor. Hissettiği tutku; gözlerinden, dudağının bükülme şeklinden ve başını hafifçe yana eğmesinden belli oluyor. Hafifçe başını sallayıp kızarmış dudaklarıyla gülümsüyor ve solgun, titrek elini uzatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When Cassia's powers recede, the austere reserve on her face is replaced for the first time by passion — in her eyes, the curve of her lips, the slight tilt of her head. With a small nod and a smile on reddened lips, she holds out her hand, pale and trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia'nın güçleri geri çekildiğinde, yüzündeki ağırbaşlı ve kayıtsız ifadenin yerini ilk kez tutku almış oluyor. Cassia'nın içindeki tutku; gözlerinden, dudağının bükülme şeklinden ve başını hafifçe yana eğmesinden belli oluyor. Hafifçe başını sallayıp kızarmış dudaklarıyla gülümseyerek solgun ve titrek elini uzatıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
